condition.narrative: In carrying out activities under the Project, the Recipient shall enter into an Insurance Contract with an Eligible Insurer underterms and conditions acceptable to the Association.

The Recipient shall, in collaboration with SPC, PIFS and the other Participating Countries, take all necessary measures on its partto ensure that the Regional Advisory Committee is maintained within PIFS from the Effective Date to November 30, 2020, with amandate, adequate resources and composition satisfactory to the Association.

title.narrative: Participating PICs have received payment within a month of the occurrence of a covered (insured) event.
The premiums are lower than the simulated price for a comparable coverage purchased individually in the market.
